net.kemuri9.gradle.mrjar

Interface Version


  • public interface Version
    A Version of JVM-language source added to the multi-release JAR.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Property<Boolean> getIncludeBaseTests()
      State of the tests for the version also including the "main" tests.
      Property<Boolean> getPrimaryModuleDefinition()
      State of the version providing the primary Module definition that goes into the root of the JAR.
      Property<Boolean> getUseJarInTests()
      State of the tests utilizing the Jar instead of the class files directly.
      Property<Boolean> getUseToolchain()
      State of the version using the associated version-specific Java toolchain to perform tasks with.
      JavaVersion getVersion()
      Version of Java that the configuration applies to
      void main(Action<VersionSource> configure)
      Configure the main source code for the JVM-language version
      void test(Action<VersionSource> configure)
      Configure the test source code for the JVM-language version

    • Method Detail

      • getIncludeBaseTests

        @Input
Property<Boolean> getIncludeBaseTests()
        State of the tests for the version also including the "main" tests. Overrides behavior from MRJarExtension.getIncludeBaseTests()
        Returns:
        Property for the state of the version centric tests using the "main" tests.

      • getPrimaryModuleDefinition

        @Input
Property<Boolean> getPrimaryModuleDefinition()
        State of the version providing the primary Module definition that goes into the root of the JAR. When true, the module-info is located into the root of the JAR instead of the versioned folder.
        Returns:
        Property for the state of the version providing the primary Module definition.

      • getUseJarInTests

        @Input
Property<Boolean> getUseJarInTests()
        State of the tests utilizing the Jar instead of the class files directly. For some scenarios where module definitions are provided, the version of a class file desired to be tested may not be able to be tested directly due to module patching behaviors. So instead of testing class files, test the actual multi-release Jar. Overrides behavior from MRJarExtension.getUseJarInTests()
        Returns:
        Property for the state of the tests using the Jar in testing.

      • getUseToolchain

        @Input
Property<Boolean> getUseToolchain()
        State of the version using the associated version-specific Java toolchain to perform tasks with. Overrides behavior from MRJarExtension.getUseToolchain()
        Returns:
        Property for the state of the version using version-specific Java toolchain to perform tasks

      • getVersion

        JavaVersion getVersion()
        Version of Java that the configuration applies to
        Returns:
        version of Java that the configuration applies to

      • main

        void main(Action<VersionSource> configure)
        Configure the main source code for the JVM-language version
        Parameters:
        configure - Action indicating the configuration to apply on VersionSource

      • test

        void test(Action<VersionSource> configure)
        Configure the test source code for the JVM-language version
        Parameters:
        configure - Action indicating the configuration to apply on VersionSource
